internships.title: Programming and Scripting Intern
internships.description: Learn basic programming concepts, problem-solving, and scripting. Build small projects to practice logic, automation, and simple UI.

internships.title: Web and Application Development Intern
internships.description: Apply frontend frameworks, backend programming, and databases to build small-scale projects. Work on apps integrating multiple technologies.

internships.title: Data Science Intern
internships.description: Work on data analysis and visualization projects using Python, Pandas, and Spark. Integrate with relational databases for realistic data-driven projects.

internships.title: Automation Testing Intern
internships.description: Automate functional testing for apps using Selenium, Java, and C#. Build test cases for web or desktop projects.

internships.title: Full Stack Development Intern
internships.description: Build end-to-end applications combining frontend, backend, and databases. Create industry-standard projects suitable for portfolio or college submission.

internships.title: Advanced Data Science Intern
internships.description: Work on complex datasets using Python, Pandas, Spark, and relational databases. Build actionable insights and deploy data-driven apps.
